member.name: AddPackageDependencyOptions
member.summary: Defines options that can be applied when adding a run-time reference to a framework package by using the function.

member.name: AddPackageDependencyOptions.AddPackageDependencyOptions_PrependIfRankCollision
member.summary: If multiple packages are present in the package graph with the same rank as the call to AddPackageDependency, the resolved package is added before others of the same rank. For more information, see .
